text:
Thanks again for the other day. 
You always know how to make me
feel special blah blah blah. Enough
sappy junk. Here's that super rad
gift I said I was gonna send. You'd
better enjoy it...or else!

Thanks again for the thing. You
know, the THING! That was pretty
cool. Hey, do you wanna know
what ELSE is pretty cool? I threw
in that present-type-thing I was
mentioning with this card. Enjoy!

See, told you I'd send that gift!
Don't get me wrong, I kinda forgot
for a while, but then I sprang up in
a panic yelling, "OH NO I FORGOT!"
and rushed out the door. But yeah!
I totally did send it! Enjoy!
